The Paper Canoe. A Guide to Theatre Anthropology

In this book Eugenio Barba analyses his thirty years of experience with the actors of Odin Teatret. He relates it to the research he has conducted in different environments and theatrical traditions of Europe, America and Asia, and he presents the results achieved by ISTA, which he founded in 1979,
